com.jonathan.survivor.inventory

Class Loadout

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jonathan.survivor.inventory.Loadout

  • public class Loadout
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Loadout()
      Creates an empty loadout with nothing inside it.
      Loadout(MeleeWeapon meleeWeapon)
      Creates a loadout with the given items.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears all of the weapons held by the player.
      MeleeWeapon getMeleeWeapon()
      Gets the MeleeWeapon held in the loadout.
      RangedWeapon getRangedWeapon()
      Returns the RangedWeapon equipped by the player.
      void setMeleeWeapon(MeleeWeapon meleeWeapon)
      Sets the MeleeWeapon held in the loadout.
      void setRangedWeapon(RangedWeapon rangedWeapon)
      Sets the RangedWeapon equipped by the player.
